projects.name: DARPA INCAS
projects.description: Influence Campaign Awareness and Sensemaking — a multi-year project on understanding influence operations in low-dimensional information spaces and their impact on populations. Developed an interactive demo system that integrates ideology embedding, narrative pathway discovery, and influencer detection. Deployed the system at: incas.csl.illinois.edu, supporting visual exploration and interactive analysis of influence campaigns.

projects.name: NYC Employment Data Analysis
projects.description: Created interactive visualizations (R, D3.js) analyzing employment counts and salary trends across demographic groups. Published a project report using R Bookdown: NYC Employment Analysis Book. Finalist, Columbia DSI Best Student Project Competition.
